title: KBR Is Poised to Resume Its Advance - Here's Our Strategy
text:
KBR, Inc. KBR has been correcting its 2019 gains the past four months. Prices look like they are ready to resume their advance.

In this daily bar chart of KBR, below, we can see that prices made a strong rally from late December to July. Prices may have gotten extended above the rising 200-day moving average line so the sideways price action the past few months has allowed prices to correct. Prices have recently closed above the declining 50-day moving average line so it looks like things are strengthening.

The On-Balance-Volume (OBV) line only made a slight decline the past couple of months and now in October it looks like the line is improving.

The Moving Average Convergence Divergence (MACD) oscillator has turned up for a cover shorts buy signal. An outright buy signal could come soon.

In this weekly bar chart of KBR, below, we can see a stock that is ready to rally. Prices are above the rising 40-week moving average line.

The weekly OBV line shows only a small dip in September and is close to making a new high for the move up.

The weekly MACD oscillator had crossed to a take profits sell signal but the indicator has begun to narrow towards a new buy signal.

In this Point and Figure chart of KBR, below, we can see that a small downside price target is being projected but the chart is really not showing us much liquidation (selling).

Bottom line strategy: Risking to $23, traders could go long KBR at current levels.
description: Let's check the charts and indicators of KBR to see if we want to join in from the long side.
authors: Kbr Is Poised To Resume Its Advance - Here'S Our Strategy
Indicators Of Kbr To See If We Want To Join In The Long Side.
